unit_rules.name: Adaptive Strategy
unit_rules.text: While leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in the unit have +[Heavy]+ and +[Assault]+.

unit_rules.name: Engrammatic Logic
unit_rules.text: Once per battle, when this unit is Activated, select a friendly Battle-Shocked +Necrons+ unit within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-Shocked
